title: 2+2 in Sherman Oaks, New Vinyl Plank Flrs, Fridge, Must See!
posting_body: ['14358 Magnolia Boulevard', 'Sherman Oaks, CA 91423', 'show contact info', 'For more information visit:', '<URL>/', 'Unit Availability: August 05, 2022', 'Magnolia Apartments in Sherman Oaks, CA has the neighborhood you want with the amenities you need.', 'Enjoy taking a dip in our relaxing pool.', 'Or, treat your friends to a poolside barbecue.', 'You’ll also enjoy our state of the art fitness center, sauna, and even a clubhouse.', 'Every home is equipped with air conditioning, a gas stove, and a breakfast bar.', 'Options like hardwood inspired floors, and quartz countertops are available in select residences.', 'Located in the beautiful community of Sherman Oaks, shopping and dining await you just moments away on Ventura Blvd.', 'Commuting is a breeze when the 101 and 405 freeways are just blocks away.', 'Step into Magnolia Apartment Homes in Sherman Oaks, CA.', 'Call today to schedule your tour!', 'Property Features:', '- State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '- Next to Sherman Oaks Park', '- Gated Assigned Parking', '- Clubhouse', '- Elevator', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- On Call Maintenance', '- Easy Access to Freeways and Shopping', '- Sauna', '- Laundry Facility', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Swimming Pool', 'Apartment Features:', '- Patio/Balcony*', '- Dishwasher', '- Spectacular Views*', '- Microwave', '- Gas Range', '- Refrigerator*', '- Granite or Quartz Countertops*', '- Extra Storage*', '- Pantry', '- Wood Inspired Floors*', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Disposal', '- Air Conditioning', '- Ceiling Fan(s)', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats Welcome with an Additional Deposit.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Magnolia Apartments', '☎', 'show contact info', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Nearby Cities: Van Nuys, Universal City, Valley Glen, Encino, Lake Balboa, Valley Village, Studio City']
